title: MC1.7：指令方块刷史莱姆塔教程
author: PotatoMaster101
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PotatoMaster101 于 2014-1-7 22:29 编辑 

大家好，今天教大家如何用指令方块刷出一个史莱姆塔。这个东西是本人无聊时创作出来的，没有任何意义。首先上图：




2.jpg (26.66 KB, 下载次数: 142)

下载附件

2014-1-7 20:15 上传








1.jpg (36.67 KB, 下载次数: 143)

下载附件

2014-1-7 20:15 上传





大家看见，这个塔就是很多史莱姆骑来骑去，而且一个比一个小。为了美观本人还加入了几个地狱史莱姆。这个想有多高就有多高，但如果太高的话塔顶的史莱姆都会被刷没。最上面的史莱姆有自定义名字。


这个也不算是个教程，指令和NBT不会讲解太多，因为以前都说过这些NBT。指令：
/summon LavaSlime ~ ~1 ~ 
{CustomName:"Slime Temple",CustomNameVisible:1,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],Size:1,Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:2,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:3,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:4,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:5,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:6,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:7,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:8,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:9,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:10,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:11,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:12,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:13,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:14,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:15,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:16,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:17,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:18,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:LavaSlime,Size:19,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple",Riding:
{id:Slime,Size:20,Invulnerable:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:1000}],CustomName:"Slime Temple"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码大家看到，整个指令就是把Riding这个NBT复制粘贴的作品。每个史莱姆都有Invulnerable:1和generic.attackDamage:1000。这些意思就是每个史莱姆都是无敌，而且拥有+1000的基础攻击。所以开生存的话都会被秒掉。每个史莱姆也有自定义名字，所以有玩家被秒后会提示出特定的死亡信息。这个史莱姆塔差不多堆了20层，再高也可以，也就是复制粘贴的事情。

大家看见指令中的Size，一个比一个大，所以塔就是下面大上面小。如果反过来的话那就可以变成史莱姆漏斗。

=======END=========
